医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新综述强调了糖尿病研究和治疗的进展一篇调查糖尿病发病机制和治疗进展的新论文探讨了导致疾病发生和进展的复杂因素，表明了解这些动态是制定有针对性的干预措施以降低患糖尿病和管理其并发症的风险的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/New-review-highlights-advances-in-diabetes-research-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/New-review-highlights-advances-in-diabetes-research-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5a5cc8a-f0fe-440b-a022-4d73212e141e Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:31:53 -0400 New review highlights advances in diabetes research and treatment
新的大脑图谱揭示了阿尔茨海默病中隐藏的细胞脆弱性研究人员创建了六个大脑区域的详细转录组图谱，揭示了阿尔茨海默病中细胞类型特异性和区域特异性的脆弱性，并强调了与认知弹性相关的星形胶质细胞基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/New-brain-atlas-reveals-hidden-cell-vulnerability-in-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/New-brain-atlas-reveals-hidden-cell-vulnerability-in-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6000c56d-de42-421d-a176-29130576e6bc Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:30:00 -0400 New brain atlas reveals hidden cell vulnerabilities in Alzheimer's
昆士兰大学开设个性化 mRNA 癌症疫苗开发新设施昆士兰大学的一个新设施将为澳大利亚研究人员提供针对个体患者量身定制的癌症疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/UQ-opens-new-facility-for-personalized-mRNA-cancer-vaccine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/UQ-opens-new-facility-for-personalized-mRNA-cancer-vaccine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ce2fbe-56dc-4937-a169-ada9aa197f58 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:20:04 -0400 UQ opens new facility for personalized mRNA cancer vaccine development
Insilico Medicine 的 PandaOmics Box 通过先进的人工智能功能增强药物发现创新药物的开发是一项昂贵、耗时且有风险的事业。平均而言，一种新药从项目启动到获得批准通常需要至少十年和数十亿美元的时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Insilico-Medicines-PandaOmics-Box-enhances-drug-discovery-with-advanced-AI-capability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Insilico-Medicines-PandaOmics-Box-enhances-drug-discovery-with-advanced-AI-capability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d183c167-ad2a-49b7-9f18-692432de78be Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:16:53 -0400 Insilico Medicine's PandaOmics Box enhances drug discovery with advanced AI capabilities
了解 NAFLD 中肝星状细胞的表观遗传调控非酒精性脂肪肝病 (NAFLD) 已成为全球慢性肝病的主要原因，2016 年至 2019 年影响全球约 38% 的人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Understanding-the-epigenic-regulation-of-hepatic-stellate-cells-in-NAFLD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Understanding-the-epigenic-regulation-of-hepatic-stellate-cells-in-NAFLD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=788576dc-2fd4-4776-bf18-c3e6316ab42d Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:12:22 -0400 Understanding the epigenetic regulation of hepatic stellate cells in NAFLD
英国倡议旨在通过健康数据合作改变 MND 研究运动神经元病是一种破坏性的疾病，影响大脑和脊髓的运动神经元，导致进行性肌肉无力和瘫痪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/UK-initiative-aims-to-transform-MND-research-through-health-data-collaboration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/UK-initiative-aims-to-transform-MND-research-through-health-data-collaboration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04138599-be6e-4f27-bb61-124603e6c73c Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:05:45 -0400 UK initiative aims to transform MND research through health data collaboration
研究发现氟比洛芬酯可有效缓解经阴道 4D 子宫输卵管造影期间的疼痛​宣布在 BIO Integration 期刊上发表新文章。本研究的目的是确定经阴道 4 维子宫输卵管造影 (TVS 4D-HyCoSy) 期间通过连续静脉滴注氟比洛芬酯注射液的镇痛效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Study-finds-flurbiprofen-ester- effective-for-pain-relief-during-transvaginal-4D-hysterosalpingography.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Study-finds-flurbiprofen-ester- effective-for-pain-relief-during-transvaginal-4D-hysterosalpingography.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bba51e2c-b9d1-46d1-8a39-e07be3c28bde Thu, 25 Jul 2024 22:03:06 -0400 Study finds flurbiprofen ester effective for pain relief during transvaginal 4D hysterosalpingography
减少使用特级初榨橄榄油可以让您的心脏更健康吗？植物性饮食中摄入两种水平的特级初榨橄榄油均可降低低密度脂蛋白胆固醇，摄入量越低效果越显着。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Can-cutting-back-on-extra-virgin-olive-oil-make-your-heart-healthier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Can-cutting-back-on-extra-virgin-olive-oil-make-your-heart-healthier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5506988-a508-4841-8c08-9c2abc3d12c3 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 21:56:00 -0400 Can cutting back on extra virgin olive oil make your heart healthier?
研究显示医疗保险对挽救生命的中风手术支付的费用不足根据今天在神经介入外科学会 (SNIS) 第 21 届年会上发表的研究，尽管血栓切除术在挽救中风患者生命方面的成功率很高，但随着时间的推移，医疗保险为该手术支付的费用会降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Research-reveals-Medicares-inadequate- payments-for-life saving-中风-procedures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Research-reveals-Medicares-inadequate- payments-for-life saving-中风-procedures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d3bc104-b044-46cc-a541-a99a71e36371 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 21:55:30 -0400 Research reveals Medicare's inadequate payments for lifesaving stroke procedures
后路椎间孔切开术与前路椎间盘切除术治疗颈神经根病的效果相当《骨与关节外科杂志》上的一项随机临床试验报道，对于患有颈神经根病的患者，后路椎间孔切开术提供的结果与更常用的前路颈椎间盘切除术相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Posterior-foraminotomy-shows-comparable-results-to-anterior-discelection-for-cervical-radiculopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Posterior-foraminotomy-shows-comparable-results-to-anterior-discelection-for-cervical-radiculopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adb6e734-d9a1-4a8e-b351-98f9223b6c79 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 21:53:32 -0400 Posterior foraminotomy shows comparable results to anterior discectomy for cervical radiculopathy
